about_the_game:
The main character, an ordinary guy from our world, gets into a terrible accident and finds himself on the brink of life and death. Suddenly, he is reborn in a parallel world where new trials and adventures await him. In this world, he learns that his mission is to battle a powerful demoness and her minions to save the kingdom from destruction. Your journey will be filled not only with battles but also with debauchery🔥

— a playful and cheerful nun who is always ready to support you in difficult times. She is the first person you will meet in this new world, and her energy and optimism will help you adapt to the new conditions.

— a modest and clumsy archer who often finds herself in awkward situations. Despite her clumsiness, she possesses excellent archery skills and is always ready to lend a hand. Her modesty and lack of confidence make her charming and sweet.

— a serious and experienced sorceress who possesses immense magical power. Her nymphomania makes her unpredictable, but her knowledge and wisdom can be crucial in your journey. She is always ready to share her knowledge and experience, but be prepared for her passionate outbursts.

In the game, you will encounter other unique characters, each adding their own touch to your adventure✨

  • 📜 Linear Novel: Immerse yourself in an engaging story full of unexpected twists.

  • 🗡️ Mini-Battles: Participate in tactical battles in the style of memory games, using unique abilities and strategies to defeat enemies.

  • ⭐ Unique Characters: Meet a variety of interesting and sexy characters.

  • 💖 Erotic Scenes: Enjoy numerous hentai scenes where the main character engages in intimate relationships with various characters, including both companions and enemies.

    Function keys:

    • Keyboard N: Complete the level

    • Keyboard L: To purposely lose a level

    • Keyboard C: Add new cards

Are you ready to accept the challenge and embark on a journey through a world filled with debauchery and dangers?😏

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains sexual contents such as sexual acts and sexual violence, non-consensual sex, sex with monsters/tentacles,It is not suitable for all ages. All characters in this work are over 18 years old.

short_description: Welcome to the world of "Chronicles of Delights" — an engaging visual novel with elements of mini-battles and an abundance of erotic scenes. Immerse yourself in an exciting adventure where the main character, who was in an accident, is reborn in a fantastical world.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Japanese
